sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import styles from './NewsBox.scss'; import classNames from 'classnames/bind'; import christmas from '../../image/album/SIA_Everyday-is-christmas.jpg'; import news1 from '../../image/092118_SIA_OC_ASIN_US_CL_1x1.jpg'; import fear from '../../image/album/sia-1000-forms-of-fear.jpg'; import born from '../../image/album/we-are-born.jpg'; import people from '../../image/album/Sia_Some-People-Have-Real-Problems.jpg'; import colour from '../../image/album/Sia_Colour-The-Small-One.jpg'; import healing from '../../image/album/Sia_Healing-Is-Difficult.jpg'; import onlysee from '../../image/album/Sia_Only-See.jpg'; const cx = classNames.bind(styles); const NewsBox = ({key}) => (
'Everyday Is Christmas' + 3 New Songs - Out Today!
The most wonderful time of the year is coming! To make your holiday
extra special Everyday Is Christmas is out today with three new bonus tracks,
including "Sing For My Life," "My Old Santa Claus,"

a cover of Perry Como's "Round and Round."
Stream/download in all your fave places or head to Target to get the exclusive CD for someone on your nice list. - Team Sia
'NEW SONG: "STEP BY STEP" OUT EXCLUSIVELY ON AMAZON MUSIC! !
It's a good day for a new song! Listen to “Step By Step” exclusively on Amazon Music 🎀- Team Sia
'Everyday Is Christmas' + 3 New Songs - Out Today!
The most wonderful time of the year is coming! To make your holiday
extra special Everyday Is Christmas is out today with three new bonus tracks,
including "Sing For My Life," "My Old Santa Claus,"

a cover of Perry Como's "Round and Round."
Stream/download in all your fave places or head to Target to get the exclusive CD for someone on your nice list. - Team Sia
'Everyday Is Christmas' + 3 New Songs - Out Today!
The most wonderful time of the year is coming! To make your holiday
extra special Everyday Is Christmas is out today with three new bonus tracks,
including "Sing For My Life," "My Old Santa Claus,"

a cover of Perry Como's "Round and Round."
Stream/download in all your fave places or head to Target to get the exclusive CD for someone on your nice list. - Team Sia
'Everyday Is Christmas' + 3 New Songs - Out Today!
The most wonderful time of the year is coming! To make your holiday
extra special Everyday Is Christmas is out today with three new bonus tracks,
including "Sing For My Life," "My Old Santa Claus,"

a cover of Perry Como's "Round and Round."
Stream/download in all your fave places or head to Target to get the exclusive CD for someone on your nice list. - Team Sia
'Everyday Is Christmas' + 3 New Songs - Out Today!
The most wonderful time of the year is coming! To make your holiday
extra special Everyday Is Christmas is out today with three new bonus tracks,
including "Sing For My Life," "My Old Santa Claus,"

a cover of Perry Como's "Round and Round."
Stream/download in all your fave places or head to Target to get the exclusive CD for someone on your nice list. - Team Sia
); export default NewsBox;
